name: PROTEXIN INFANT SACHET
kandungan: Lactobacillus casei 4 x 10(8) CFU, Lactobacillus rhamnosus 3.5 x 10(8) CFU, Streptococcus thermophilus 1 x 10(8) CFU, Bifidobacterium breve 5 x 10(7) CFU, Lactobacillus acidophilus 5 x 10(7) CFU, Bifidobacterium infantis 4 x 10(7) CFU, Lactobacillus bulgaricus 1 x 10(7) CFU, fructooligosaccharides 990 mg.
indikasi: Diare, intoleransi laktosa, konstipasi, flatulen, infeksi candida.
